snippet: Thomas Crawford led the American Classical Orchestra on Monday in pieces including one featuring the violinist Monica Huggett, at Lincoln Center.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews American Classical Orchestra's final concert of the season at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: Thomas Crawford led the American Classical Orchestra on Monday in pieces including one featuring the violinist Monica Huggett, at Lincoln Center.

headline.print_headline: Weaving a Tapestry Between Bits of Prometheus
headline.seo: American Classical Orchestra at Alice Tully Hall
headline.main: Weaving a Tapestry Between Bits of Prometheus
